text: Fifty Roads to Town is a 1937 American romantic comedy movie directed by Norman Taurog and based on the novel by Frederick Nebel. It stars Don Ameche, Ann Sothern, John Qualen, Slim Summerville, Jane Darwell and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1937 comedy movies Category:1930s American romance movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Norman Taurog
title: Fifty Roads to Town
